about_the_game:
The Wolf Within is a single-player exploration game about a wolf and a spirit that embark on a journey in a mysterious world that is affected by an ancient dark presence.

Make your way through different environments such as forests, snowy mountains, and more!

Use your strengths and abilities to overcome any obstacle and reach your goal!

KEY FEATURES

Explore the world of The Wolf Within
Venture in the once thriving world of The Wolf Within, now taken over by an ancient dark presence. Restore balance and put an end in this millenia old corruption.

  • Unlock and refine abilities
  • Solve puzzles and uncover pieces of the past.
  • Semi-open world
  • Not a wolf simulator

Still in development, many things are subject to change

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
